review: It is such a good deal! I have been wanting to watch some Amazon shows but especially the Bosch series. We have a DVR but Amazon was not one of the apps on it so we went this route and have been very pleased.
author: M. W. Harvey

review: Easy set up.  Provides so many options.  Portable in the home.  The family loves it!
author: Allison Foster

review: Better than i hoped it would be.  I have downloaded the free app and use my Iphone to control it.
author: EduardoT

review: It meets all my needs. The price is right on budget and the stick does everything my bother ' competitors stick does.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy to use. And much cheaper then cable. So far we like it.
author: Megan Murphy

review: I loved it! I put it in my room and I didn't get out of my room for days after getting it.
author: michelle glendenning

review: Excellent. I'm very happy to have this Fire tv stick. Awesome👍👍👍
author: Elena M.

review: Nowhere near the Fire TV....slow menus choices...buffers all of the time
author: JJ
